snippet.title: So I Guess I'm Making a 4D Game Now... - 4D Golf Devlog #1
snippet.description:
This is the first of a new Devlog series about the development of my untitled 4D game.  More details to come in the next video, but check out the FAQ section below for more details.

Hyperbolica is now on the Oculus/Meta Quest Store!
Quest Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4873486596022103
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1256230/Hyperbolica/
Itch: https://codeparade.itch.io/hyperbolica

Support me and innovative projects like these!
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/codeparade
Ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/codeparade
Merch: https://crowdmade.com/collections/codeparade

FAQ
Q - What game engine are you using?
A - Unity (with major hacks much like Hyperbolica)
Q - Will you support VR?  Or anaglyph?
A - Maybe.
Q - How much will the game cost?
A - Depends on the scope, but probably similar to Hyperbolica's price-point.
Q - Do you have a release date?
A - Not Yet.

Music (CC BY-SA)
Nesh Carrot - Hilltops https://billcornwell.co.uk/music.html
Vani - Sueño Rosa https://setega.bandcamp.com/album/mmxvii
